clinical_particulars.therapeutic_indications: For the treatment of cancer in combination with 5 fluorouracil

contraindications.pharmacodynamics: Eniluracil is an orally active dihydropyrimidine dehydrogenase DPD inhibitor designed to enhance activity of chemotaxic agents It is under investigation by Adherex under license from GlaxoSmithKline for the treatment of cancer in combination with 5 fluorouracil 5 FU
